Re CitizensEnron Hedging Transactions Cc Theresa I would assume that a documented agreement exists between ENA and Citizens that sets forth the monthly volume and hedged priced I would like a copy of that agreement if it exists In absence of any such agreement I would like to have a copy of anything documentation that will help Citizens validate the hedging transactions for the months July August and September Thanks for your assistance John John A Cogan The Johnco Group LLC Lake Kristin Drive Gretna LA HomeOffice Cell Fax

CitizensENAPPL July Deliveries Cc Kim Citizens needs confirmation from ENA on deliveries to the TWGriffith interconnect for the following July PPL claims that they bought gas after AM from Enron Citizens has billed them for the deliveries but PPL has the deal as a purchase from Enron in there system and desire to have Enron bill them Is this acceptable to Enron July PPL claims that they bought gas after AM from a third party Texaco in the basin and had it transported under the CitizensPPL deal Does Enron agree with this transaction Thanks John John A Cogan The Johnco Group LLC Lake Kristin Drive Gretna LA HomeOffice Cell Fax
